physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on front of photograph: ''1939 Membership Campaign Workers, Sam S. Ginsberg, Pres. - Louis E. Shuteran Chairman.'' Handwritten on back of photograph: ''#406 B'nai B'rith 171, 1939, 1939 Membership Campaign Workers, Sam S. Ginsberg Pres., Louis E Shuteran Chairman.''

mods.abstract: 1939 B'nai B'rith, Lodge 171, Denver, Colorado Membership Campaign workers, a group of men dressed in suits sit around two tables at a dinner.
